description: Supplemental sequence processing and R statistical analysis for publication which compares the microbiome of 27 Zea cultivars: 12 Inbred maize genotypes, 9 hybrids, and 6 wild teosinte. The project contains amplicon data for various genes: 16S rRNA, ITS, bacterial amoA, Archeal amoA, nirS, nirK, and nosZ. In addition to functional potential assay data, and N2O flux.
name: favela3/Maize.N-cycle.Function
